title: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut
notes:
Performance is great, I get more than 60 FPS on average on the highest settings. However, the cut scenes won't work unless I set the lighting to the lowest setting. 

There is also a bug which sometimes will cause the textures from the player as well as the NPC models to disappear. This happens rarely, but when it does the only thing that seems to fix it is exiting both the game and the Steam client and re-opening them. Quitting just the game won't fix the issue.

title: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut
notes: Run perfect about 30 min. With textures mode on 2560x1080 21:9 screen (some bug in cut scene,but on Win exactly same - to avoid it just turn "lightning quality" to low )
